title: @Riot: Ocean Week Question
body:
Will the Fizz summoner icon be available for other regions, or will it be exclusive to OCE (assuming we meet the point requirement)?

I tried finding an answer online, but wasn't able to come up with anything specified by a Rioter.

Either way, it's no scales off my fishy back since I already transferred to OCE because I want the Fizz icon so bad, I'm just curious and want to know. ♥

replies.body: Are you the Tundra Fizz from NA? Who was dating Fisherman Fizz?

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YtEfdR3n,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-24T22:16:02.883+0000)
>
> Are you the Tundra Fizz from NA? Who was dating Fisherman Fizz?

Yep, though unfortunately it looks like they have disabled being able to post on any accounts other than OCE, so that means I must use this account from now on. D:

> [{quoted}](name=Tundra Fizz OCE,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YtEfdR3n,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-01-24T22:26:34.233+0000)
>
> Yep, though unfortunately it looks like they have disabled being able to post on any accounts other than OCE, so that means I must use this account from now on. D:

Ah you're the cute one! You guys stil ldating or did you guys break up?
OT: It's for OCE only sadly.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YtEfdR3n,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-01-26T08:12:32.491+0000)
>
> Ah you're the cute one! You guys stil ldating or did you guys break up?
> OT: It's for OCE only sadly.

Thanks for the cute compliment ♥

He decided to break up with me near the end of November since he wasn't "feeling like he loved me" anymore. I was really depressed for over a month, but I'm mostly over it now

> [{quoted}](name=Tundra Fizz OCE,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YtEfdR3n,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-26T18:23:43.739+0000)
>
> Thanks for the cute compliment ♥
> 
> He decided to break up with me near the end of November since he wasn't "feeling like he loved me" anymore. I was really depressed for over a month, but I'm mostly over it now

I used to stalk you on NA :D! Whatever though, you were way out of his league. I'm not going to rant on love as it'll clear these already dead forums quicker than.. something. But I'm glad you're good now. :D

I think its only for oce


If it is, i feel super sorry for you

If you're super desperate, i can trasfer, for event than transfer back xd
around $50+ just for the fish icon lel

> [{quoted}](name=Dota2forthewin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YtEfdR3n,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-23T08:11:57.805+0000)
>
> I think its only for oce
> 
> 
> If it is, i feel super sorry for you
> 
> If you're super desperate, i can trasfer, for event than transfer back xd
> around $50+ just for the fish icon lel

I actually transferred a couple hours before making this thread, I just wanted to see if I could confirm that I wouldn't be spending any extra money that I wouldn't have to.

But because I would much rather be safe than sorry (just in case it never becomes available in NA), I'm totally willing to do all this just to get the special Fizz icon. ♥

Also wow, I'm surprised that the Boards let me post on my NA account even after I transferred it to OCE.

> [{quoted}](name=Tundra Fizz,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YtEfdR3n,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-23T08:31:48.457+0000)
>
> Also wow, I'm surprised that the Boards let me post on my NA account even after I transferred it to OCE.

And I can post on my transferred-over account as well.

I guess it's an easy way to get some extra level 30 forum smurfs, given that NA-to-OCE transfers are free right now. But then again you'd lose the ability to play on your previous NA account until you go back.

> [{quoted}](name=Tundra Fizz NA,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YtEfdR3n,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-23T08:42:04.783+0000)
>
> And I can post on my transferred-over account as well.
> 
> I guess it's an easy way to get some extra level 30 forum smurfs, given that NA-to-OCE transfers are free right now. But then again you'd lose the ability to play on your previous NA account until you go back.

I love fizz aswell.


Not as in his abilities nor lore. 

I just love the way he looks. He's cute. =D
{{champion:105}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:105}}
On FF@20 I am sure they said something abotut other regions getting it, but they would have to pay an ominiously unexplained price.

> [{quoted}](name=Slim Chaedi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YtEfdR3n,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-26T08:17:11.301+0000)
>
> On FF@20 I am sure they said something abotut other regions getting it, but they would have to pay an ominiously unexplained price.

Yep that's right, Riot Maraudaur made a post here.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/VgkpTJp8-ocean-week-qa?comment=00120000

He did that two days after I made this thread though, which is kind of annoying that Riot completely ignored this thread (even after it has a decent amount of upvotes) x_x
Yeh, I think I saw something like that somewhere.
id lmao if you lose the fizz icon when you transfer to some other region

> [{quoted}](name=TheOneUser,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YtEfdR3n,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-23T23:30:27.387+0000)
>
> id lmao if you lose the fizz icon when you transfer to some other region

You don't; people have kept all of their summoner icons that you can get only get in a particular region once they transfer (this has happened with some of the servers in South America in the past).

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/01/122-pbe-update.html
Apparently no word yet on availability in other regions.
